ovdesc.p: Defines the default charge amount for transaction based charges.

desc.p: The number of transactions upto which the charges mentioned in the field below will be charged at the rate of charge per transaction.
Multi value fields associated with 3 where different ranges of transaction levels and charge amount can be input
Associated multi-value field with field Default.Chg
Optional field
Must be a relevant company code
This field indicates whether the charge calculation is to be based on BAND or LEVEL type.
For example if the number of transaction (both credit and debit) on 3.10.2003 is say 40. The values are set up as follows:
1. Calculation Type BAND
2.1 Upto Txn 10
4.1.1 Currency USD
5.1.1.Flat Charge 10.00
2.2 Upto Txn 20
4.2.1 Currency USD
5.2.1 Flat Charge 15
4.3.1 Currency USD
5.3.1 Flat Charge 20
In the above set up the accumulated charges will be calculated as follows:
Number of transactions; 40
Charges; Type- band,
First 10 transactions-USD10
Next 10 transactions-USD15
Remaining 20 transactions-USD20
Supposing Calculation type is given as level, then in the above case the charges will be USD20.
BAND or LEVEL
Mandatory Field

Defines the Currency for which the Number of Txns Charge details in associated Fields 5 apply. For Accounts in Currencies not specified by this Field, the Default Amounts specified in Fields 3 is used.
Fields 4 and 5 are used to define Amounts for calculating Number of Txns Charges on Accounts in specific Currencies.
3 type SSS (SWIFT) characters Currency code. or 1-3 numeric characters (will be converted to Currency code).
It must be a valid code on the CURRENCY table (Ref: General Tables).
Specifies the amount, in local currency equivalent, to be charged per chargeable transaction for the Currency of the Account.

Amounts for calculating transaction Charges in specific Currencies can be specified in the multivalue associated group of Fields 4 and 5. The Default Amounts specified in Fields 2 and 3 are used if there is no entry in Field 5 for the Currency of the Account.
1-14 numeric characters plus a decimal point.
The number of decimals may not exceed the number for local currency.
Defines the amount to be charged in the Currency defined in the preceding field.
Up to 14 AMT type characters (standard amount format).
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
